src:
Romelu Lukaku Moncer di Inter, Manchester United Kena Sindir deh
06 Nov 2019, 02:07 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Ketajaman Romelu Lukaku di Inter Milan membuat banyak netizen akhirnya mengolok dan menyindir mantan klubnya, Manchester United.
Romelu Lukaku baru saja tampil gemilang memborong dua gol timnya saat mengalahkan Bologna 2-1 pada lanjutan Serie A di Stadion Renato Dall'Ara, Minggu (3/11/2019). Gol Romelu Lukaku tercipta pada menit 75 dan penalti di menit ke-90+1. Adapun gol Bologna dilesakkan Roberto Soriano pada menit ke-59.
Dua gol Lukaku itu semakin menegaskan kebangkitan Lukaku bersama Inter Milan. Sejak awal September Lukaku mencetak delapan gol.
Sedangkan sejak berseragam Inter Milan, striker asal Belgia itu mencetak sembilan gol dalam 11 pertandingan.
Penampilan apik Lukalu membuat mantan klubnya, Manchester United jadi sasaran olok-olok. Apalagi Lukaku memang didepak Lukaku dari Old Trafford karena dianggap tak berkontribusi maksimal bersama Setan Merah. Tapi, setelah dilego ke Inter Milan dia malah moncer.
Sebaliknya, MU benar-benar terpuruk pada musim ini. Tim besutan Ole Gunnar Solskjaer baru membukukan tiga kemenangan pada musim ini sehingga terpuruk di posisi ke-10 klasemen sementara Premier League.
Kondisi keduanya yang bertolak belakang setelah berpisah pada musim panas ini pun memicu keisengan para netizen, khususnya dari para fans rival Manchester United. Mereka pun melempar olokan dan sindiran kepada Setan Merah.

Seperti apa sindiran dan olok-olokan itu? Simak berikut ini.
text:
Romelu Lukaku Moncer at Inter, Manchester United Got Cursed
Nov 6 2019, 02:07 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Romelu Lukaku's sharpness at Inter Milan made many netizens end up making fun of and teasing his former club, Manchester United.
Romelu Lukaku has just performed brilliantly to buy up two of his team's goals when they beat Bologna 2-1 in Serie A at the Renato Dall'Ara Stadium on Sunday (3/11/2019). Romelu Lukaku's goal came in the 75th minute and a penalty in the 90th minute +1. The Roberto Soriano Bologna goal scored in the 59th minute.
Two of Lukaku's goals reinforce Lukaku's resurrection with Inter Milan. Since early September Lukaku has scored eight goals.
Whereas since the uniform of Inter Milan, the Belgian striker scored nine goals in 11 matches.
Lukalu's neat appearance made his former club Manchester United become a target of banter. Moreover, Lukaku was kicked Lukaku from Old Trafford because it was considered not to contribute optimally with the Red Devils. But, after being sold to Inter Milan, he was even better.
Conversely, MU really slumped this season. Ole Gunnar Solskjaer's new team has just won three wins this season so it slumped in 10th place in the Premier League standings.
The condition of the two who contradicted after separating this summer also sparked the fad of netizens, especially from rival fans of Manchester United. They also threw ridicule and satire at the Red Devils.

What are the insinuations and teases? Consider the following.
